TEXT.TITLE: BUNDESBANK WILL NOT HOLD PRESS CONFERENCE TOMORROW
TEXT.BODY: The Bundesbank will not hold a press conference after its regular fortnightly council meeting tomorrow, a spokeswoman said in answer to enquiries. Bundesbank President Karl Otto Poehl will chair the meeting. The next meeting is scheduled for April 2. REUTER
